description: You encounter a lost and panicked traveler. Help them find their way?
successOutcome: You successfully guide the traveler to safety. They reward you for helping them.
failureOutcome: You lose your way in the attempt, spending valuable time and losing some of your valuables.

solutions.solutionText: Convince them to pay you for their safety...
Try to lead the traveler to a safe place.
Try to calm the traveler so they can find their own way back.

description: You stumble upon a hidden treasure chest!
successOutcome: You discover valuable items in the treasure chest.
failureOutcome: The treasure chest turns out to be a mimic! You lose some of your valuables as you fight it off.

description: You trigger a hidden trap in the forest.
successOutcome: You escape the trap and salvage some valuable components.
failureOutcome: The trap injures you and you lose some valuables.

solutions.solutionText: Break open the trap to free yourself.
Use a nearby branch as leverage to escape the trap.

description: You encounter a group of hostile bandits.
successOutcome: You manage to leave the encounter with more than you came in with. Excellent maneuvering!
failureOutcome: You are unable to keep your valuables safe.

solutions.solutionText: Convince the bandits you have nothing worth taking.
Convince the group there is a traitor among them, taking your leave when infighting eventually starts.
